entry.title: For Content Creators Who Use AI, Disclosure Is Key
entry.summary: As with most conferences, SEG3 Los Angeles was buzzing with talk of artificial intelligence and its impact on media makers.

entry.title: 'Shardbound' NFT Game Reveals Next Playtest—Here's How to Get Access
entry.summary: Immutable zkEVM game Shardbound is launching a limited playtest this month, and you can be one of the 2,000 players given access.

entry.title: What Is Bluesky? The Decentralized Twitter Alternative That's Now Open to the Public
entry.summary: While Bluesky seems like Twitter on the surface, the AT protocol architecture it is run on has the potential to be revolutionary.

entry.title: Mastercard's UEFA Champions League Game Lets Cardholders Win Tickets via NFT Pass
entry.summary: Powered by MoonPay, Mastercard’s soccer trivia game lets customers use a free NFT pass–and potentially win Champions League Final tickets.

entry.title: Pyth’s Airdrop Put $140 Million Into Crypto Users' Wallets—Now Round 2 Is Here
entry.summary: The second phase of the DeFi oracle network’s Solana token airdrop will benefit the makers of dapps that utilize Pyth data.

entry.title: 'Fight League' Games Coming to Ronin Following RON's Binance Listing
entry.summary: Ethereum scaling network Ronin has been busy lately, including with a token listing on Binance, and now it’s adding even more games.

entry.title: Dymension Gains 58% in First Day, But Questions Loom About Big Brain Staking
entry.summary: DYM saw massive gains in its first day after $390 million worth of tokens were airdropped yesterday. But now questions swirl about a validator.

entry.title: CoinFLEX Creditors React to OPNX Closure: 'They Have Left a Trail of Destruction'
entry.summary: "They think it's the greatest fun in the world," a CoinFLEX creditor told Decrypt. "But, OX.Fun is just the reincarnation of OPNX."

entry.title: Hong Kong Chamber of Commerce Wants Chinese Yuan-Backed Stablecoin
entry.summary: The business advocacy organization suggested the issuance of yuan-backed stablecoins alongside the launch of a "Virtual Asset Connect Scheme."

entry.title: Bankrupt Firms 3AC and BlockFi Reach Counterclaim Settlement—But Details Are Sealed
entry.summary: BlockFi alleged that 3AC was in debt to them for $129 million. 3AC countered with claims that BlockFi owed them $280 million.

entry.title: Hacker Claims to Have Accessed Law Enforcement System Used by Binance and Coinbase
entry.summary: A spokesperson for law enforcement system Kodex disputed the claims, saying that the hacker's screenshots show incomplete processes.

entry.title: No Cap: Buzzy Eigenlayer Blows Past $3 Billion Total Value Locked
entry.summary: With limits removed until Friday, Feb. 9, the security-focused staking protocol is trying to balance being neutral and being decentralized.

entry.title: People Are Using Basic AI to Bypass KYC —But Should You?
entry.summary: For $15 you can get an AI-generated ID to open a bank account, unban your crypto, and open the gates that anti-money laundering measures closed.

entry.title: 'Heroes of Mavia' Airdrops Token to 100,000 Gamers, Ethereum NFT Owners
entry.summary: After racking up over a million downloads in a matter of days, Skrice Studios has released the MAVIA token on Ethereum.

entry.title: SEC Delays Joint Ethereum ETF Proposal from Invesco, Galaxy Digital
entry.summary: The regulator has pushed back a decision on approving—or denying—an ETH ETF proposal from Invesco and Galaxy Digital.

entry.title: Jack Dorsey-Backed COPA Wants Satoshi Nakamoto ‘False Narrative’ Put to Rest
entry.summary: Lawyers argue Wright's claim of being Bitcoin’s inventor is supported by "forgery on an industrial scale.”

entry.title: Dymension Goes Live, Airdrops $390 Million in DYM to Solana, Ethereum Users and More
entry.summary: “RollApps” chain Dymension launches its mainnet and sends out loads of DYM to users across Solana, Ethereum scalers, and beyond.

entry.title: MicroStrategy Buys $37.2M More BTC Ahead of Bitcoin Halving
entry.summary: The software company is not slowing down with its Bitcoin strategy.

entry.title: This AI Can ‘Catch Them All’ in Pokemon Battles As Well as Humans
entry.summary: Built by researchers at the Georgia Institute of Technology, POKE ́LLMON is an AI agent that uses human-like learning and adaptable strategies to become a master Pokemon player.

entry.title: SEC Advances Rules for Securities Dealers, But Leaves Crypto A Mere Footnote
entry.summary: The latest updates to a law from 1934 still don't cover digital assets, even after stakeholders asked for it.

entry.title: Digital Currency Group Slams Genesis Payment Plan
entry.summary: Because of appreciation in the value of the crypto holdings in question, DCG says says its subsidiary’s repayment schedule will unfairly enrich some claimants.

entry.title: Solana Outage Can't Stop GameStop Tribute Meme Coin From Skyrocketing
entry.summary: The GME token inspired by GameStop has nearly doubled in price over the past day, even amid the Solana network outage.

entry.title: US Treasury Secretary Calls For Crypto Legislation On ‘Non-Security’ Tokens
entry.summary: Existing laws leave gaps in crypto that enforcement agencies don't account for, Janet Yellen argues.

entry.title: Solana Went Down Again—It Likely Won't Be the Last Time
entry.summary: Outages are a recurring headache, but Solana developers say it’s worth tolerating to ensure long-term safety and security.

entry.title: Twitter Rival Bluesky Opens to Public Right as Farcaster Gains Steam
entry.summary: Bluesky, a decentralized social media platform, has gained 3 million users since it launched in beta last March.

entry.title: Bitcoin Halving Nears and BTC Miner CleanSpark Is Preparing for Lower Fees
entry.summary: The new acquisitions will bump up CleanSpark's Bitcoin mining capacity to 2.4 exahashes per second, says the company.

entry.title: Farcaster Explained: The Blockchain-Powered Decentralized Social Media Protocol
entry.summary: Farcaster leverages blockchain technology to provide a framework on which multiple social media apps can be built.

entry.title: Robinhood Adds MetaMask for Easier Ethereum Buys
entry.summary: The integration aims to make buying digital coins and tokens a seamless experience.

entry.title: Solana Price Rebounds as Network Restarts After Outage
entry.summary: The Solana network was down almost five hours before a software patch brought it back online, marking the first major outage in nearly a year.

entry.title: Archaeologists Tap AI to Decipher Ancient Scrolls Nearly Lost to Volcano
entry.summary: The 2,000-year-old documents were burnt, brittle, and could not be unrolled. But scientists were finally able to read some of it.

entry.title: SOL Dips 4% Following Solana Network Outage
entry.summary: The price of Solana's SOL token wavered after the network rolled out a software update to validators following a "major outage."

entry.title: Real-time AI Chat Translation Comes to Roblox
entry.summary: The new feature instantly translates chat messages between 16 languages, enabling players to connect globally in their native tongues.

entry.title: South Korea Arrests Haru Invest Executives Over Alleged $826M Embezzlement
entry.summary: The firm, which claimed to offer double-digit yields on cryptocurrencies, abruptly shut down user withdrawals in June 2023.

entry.title: Why Gmoney Took Out a $1 Million Loan on a CryptoPunks NFT
entry.summary: Pseudonymous NFT collector and entrepreneur Gmoney joined Rug Radio's live "FOMO Hour" show to discuss why he took out a $1 million loan on one of the most recognizable CryptoPunks NFTs around.

entry.title: Solana Hunger Games: Explained in One Minute or Less
entry.summary: Rug Radio Creator and crypto influencer AshleyDCan explains the latest sensation taking over timelines on Crypto Twitter, Solana Hunger Games. The new "crypto AR" game from GG.zip is backed by Delphi and plans to launch in the spring. Here's what going on, explained in one minute or less.

entry.title: 5 Questions With SCENE: Gala Marija Vrbanic
entry.summary:
Tribute Brand founder and CEO Gala Marija Vrbanic joins 5 Questions With SCENE to discuss not just fashion, but graffiti crimes, fishless aquariums, and the apparently emergent sport of wind chasing.
Video shot and edited by Vincent Roazzi Jr.

entry.title: Why Is Everyone Talking About Jupiter on Solana?
entry.summary: Rug Radio Creator and crypto influencer AshleyDCan explains why the crypto world can't stop talking about Solana's Jupiter. What is JUP? Who qualified for the airdrop? And will there be another round?

entry.title: Jupiter Founder Meow Unloads on the Solana Airdrop 'FUD'
entry.summary: Meow, the pseudonymous founder of Solana DEX aggregator Jupiter, made a surprise appearance today on Rug Radio's "FOMO Hour" to address the JUP airdrop "FUD," and explain why he believes the backlash to the team's launch liquidity pool is unfounded.

entry.title: The Future is Multichain w/ Jason Trikakis from Holograph
entry.summary:
Reza is joined by Jason from Holograph.xyz
They dive into the multichain future and what that means for NFTs, DeFi, RWAs, and more.

entry.title: How Generative AI Makes for a More Inclusive Metaverse in 'Avalon'
entry.summary: Avalon Chief Product Officer Jeffrey Butler speaks with Decrypt reporter Jason Nelson about the use of generative AI within the upcoming game and how it will help players from anywhere and everywhere truly see themselves represented in the online world.

entry.title: How a Perfume DAO Crafted a 'Scent of the Metaverse'
entry.summary: Rook Perfumes founder Nadeem Crowe and Melissa Gilmour of Web3 creative agency Lily & Piper join Stephen Graves to talk about how they created a fragrance with a DAO and brought it to the shelves of London department store Harvey Nichols.

entry.title: Trash-Fueled BTC Mining w/ Chris Bennet
entry.summary:
Reza is joined by Chris Bennet from Spacestation Investments.
They discuss: - Mining BTC with energy generated from landfills - How to increase deal-flow - Running an agency vs running a fund

entry.title: Preview of Agoria's 'Le Code d’Orsay'
entry.summary: A first look at "Sigma Lumina," a sculpture by artist and musician Agoria in collaboration with Johan Lescure. It features in "Le Code d’Orsay," the first NFT exhibition at the Musée d’Orsay.

entry.title: Are you the one being farmed? w/ Frisson
entry.summary:
Reza is joined by Frisson from Tallyx.xyz
They reflect on: - building in the bear market - the points system meta - will zoomers care about decentralization

entry.title: 'Look Touch Own': OONA Discusses Her Performance Art Exhibition
entry.summary: Conceptual artist OONA joins moderator Raina Marie to discuss "Look Touch Own," her performance art exhibition featuring her own former breast implants, which have been tokenized. This conversation was recorded at Rug Radio's R Haus event at Art Basel Miami in December 2023.

entry.title: Genius Marketing by Genius Marketers: How Crypto Builders Can Reach the Masses
entry.summary: Rug Radio founder Farokh Sarmad moderates a conversation between 9dcc founder and CEO Gmoney and Serotonin founder and CEO Amanda Cassatt about the challenges and opportunities in Web3 marketing and how they're navigating the ever-evolving space. Recorded at Rug Radio's R Haus event at Art Basel Miami in December 2023.

entry.title: Generative Art Across Mediums: Artists Discuss the Evolving Space
entry.summary: In this panel discussion from Rug Radio's R Haus at Art Basel Miami 2023, Sofia Garcia, Ismail Tazi, Emily Edelman, and Aleksandra Art discuss the expanding generative art space—and why "generative" doesn't necessarily have to mean digital.

entry.title: The AI Coin to Rule Them All with Mike Grantis
entry.summary: Reza is joined by Mike Grantis from Contango Digital to discuss - The AI coin to rule them all - The Solana Ecosystem - What's next for Solana airdrops

entry.title: Conversation With Snowfro: Bringing 'Chromie Squiggle' #8107 to the Physical Space
entry.summary: Art Blocks founder and CEO and "Chromie Squiggle" project creator Erick "snowfro" Calderon spoke with Benny Redbeard Gross at Rug Radio's R Haus event at Art Basel 2023, to discuss how and why "Chromie Squiggle" NFT #8107 was given a special edition print run in collaboration with Avant Arte.
